proposal: Hey Floki SafeMoon enthusiasts, you've been having a laugh with 795 fellow jesters on the BSC network - that's no joke! How about we add a twist to this parody saga? With our B2B tools, anyone can deploy a DEX or a Lottery, adding another layer of fun to the FSM community. Just imagine, a Floki SafeMoon Lottery or your very own FSM DEX. Remember, it's still for entertainment purposes only! See my profile for demo and details.
